Gruppe 1
A10 = 000000000000000000010100
A11 = 000000000000000000010101
A20 = 000000000100000000010100
A21 = 000000000100000000010101
A30 = 000000000001000000010100
A31 = 000000000001000000010101
A40 = 000000000101000000010100
A41 = 000000000101000000010101
Gruppe 2
A50 = 000000000000010000010100
A51 = 000000000000010000010101
A60 = 000000000100010000010100
A61 = 000000000100010000010101
A70 = 000000000001010000010100
A71 = 000000000001010000010101
A80 = 000000000101010000010100
A81 = 000000000101010000010101
...
Gruppe 4
AF0 = 000000000101010100010100
AF1 = 000000000101010100010101

---
A10 = 000000000000000000010100
B10 = 010000000000000000010100
C10 = 000100000000000000010100
D10 = 010100000000000000010100
E10 = 000001000000000000010100
F10 = 010001000000000000010100
G10 = 000101000000000000010100
...
P10 = 010101010000000000010100
------------------
       _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
      0x0x0x0x0y0y0y0y0001010z

      x - house id
      y - device id
      z - operation
